attributes.action: Britain Should Support the Kony 2012 Campaign
attributes.additional_details:
Joseph Kony is THE most wanted man on the International Criminal Court most wanted list.
All the information you need about why this man should be stopped can be found below (the campaign's website and it's YouTube video). Great Britain should be doing as much as any other decent country and supporting the troops in Africa attempting to stop this man. They should be doing everything they can.
http://www.kony2012.com/
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y4MnpzG5Sqc
